timeline.message: Add ShapeOps Enhancement to work with org.tensorflow.op.core.Shape directly
Removed println's on TestCases, removed unused testcase, changed calls to match new ShapeOps @operator style
Fixed Java Doc to capitalize start of summary, remove unnecessary parens aroune new int[], fixed license

timeline.bodyText: Could you clean up the static imports so they are adjacent?
timeline.author: Craigacp

replies.bodyText: Actually there were several cases of unused imports for JUnit. I used a sed script to make the JUnit changes, so these were there before, but I'll be glad to clean them up.
replies.author: JimClarke5

timeline.bodyText: Looks like this got updated in after the shape change was integrated. @karllessard do you think it's worth making a separate PR (or just you push the ops update separately) so we don't have commits that make unintentional changes?
timeline.author: Craigacp

replies.bodyText: I think it is up to you @JimClarke5 , normally this file should have been committed in your previous PR adding shape operators. Ideally we would commit it as a separate PR to keep this history clean, but I won't insist neither if you prefer we keep things simpler and just merge this PR as is.
replies.author: karllessard

timeline.message: Removed unused static imports for Junit.
Removed unused static imports for Junit.
